protocol.name: P-G9408-1
protocol.text: Plants were grown in standard green house conditions using a 16:8 light-dark cycle.

protocol.name: P-G9408-2
protocol.text: Fifteen micrograms of total RNA was poly(A)+ selected using Dynabeads mRNA purification kit (Dynal Inc.).  Double-stranded cDNAs were generated using Superscript Choice System (Invitrogen).  Biotinylated cRNAs were synthesized with the ENZO BioArray High Yield RNA Transcript Labeling Kit (Enzo Life Sciences).

protocol.name: P-G9408-3
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using TRIzol (Invitrogen) and poly(A)+ RNA was selected using Dynabeads mRNA Purification kit (Dynal Inc) according to the manufacturers.
